dict.acceptation: 试验；[法]审讯，审判；磨难，困难；[体]选拔赛；

sent.orig: Article 170 Sale by Trial In a sale trial, the parties may prescribe the trial period.
sent.trans: 第一百七十条试用买卖的当事人可以约定标的物的试用期间。

sent.orig: Mock trial is a special law practice, consisting of preparation, mock trial and summarization.
sent.trans: 摘要模拟法庭审判是一种特殊的法学实践方法，分为前期准备、模拟庭审、后期总结三个阶段。

sent.orig: After 7 years, from First Trial to Second Trial, both outcomes actually were very different.
sent.trans: 经过7年的时间，法院从第一审至第二审的判决结果竟然出现南辕北辙的情形。

sent.orig: Methods Simulated field trial and field trial were carried out to detect its germicidal efficacy.
sent.trans: 方法在实验室内，采用模拟现场试验及现场试验方法对其杀菌效果进行检测。

sent.orig: State will expand the trial of BOT and start trial of TOT in drawing foreign investment.
sent.trans: 积极扩大西部地区以BOT方式利用外资的试点，开展以tot方式利用外资的试点。
